first-step-title: Create a decision that gets noticed
first-step-sub-title: It takes 2 mins to post your decision, try building one of the following
first-step-auction-sub-title: The audience send bids with their suggestions.
first-step-multiple-choice-sub-title: The audience pay to vote on options presented by you.
first-step-crowdfunding-sub-title: The audience fund your single goal together.
